best_practice_option: Communications are timely, clear, and actionable
remediation_description: Improve organizational communications to be more timely, clear, and actionable
remediation_solution: Conduct an assessment of current communication practices and channels. Identify areas for improvement around timeliness, clarity, and ability to drive action based on the communications. Develop updated practices, channels, and example communications to address the gaps.
remediation_general_considerations: Ensure two-way communication channels to enable clarifying questions and feedback. Use simple language and avoid complex technical terms when possible.
effort_estimate: 2 weeks - Assessment of current practices (1 week), Development of updated practices and examples (1 week)
resources_needed: Communications lead, Sample audiences for updated practices
